snippet: Two Fullerton police officers were ordered Wednesday to stand trial in the death of a mentally ill homeless man after a violent arrest last summer.
abstract: Fullerton, Calif, police officers Manuel Ramos and Cpl Jay Cicinelli are ordered to stand trial in the death of mentally ill homeless man Kelly Thomas following his violent arrest in 2011; Ramos is charged with second-degree murder and Cicinelli with involuntary manslaughter, among other charges.
lead_paragraph: Two Fullerton police officers were ordered Wednesday to stand trial in the death of a mentally ill homeless man after a violent arrest last summer.

headline.main: California: Officers Will Face Trial in the Killing of a Homeless Man
headline.print_headline: California: Officers Will Face Trial In the Killing of a Homeless Man
